overview: It's Nova! In the Navy! Five fancy free young sailors in a wild sexual romp! At their hotel, Mike and Dan take liberty with the desk clerk while Tim gets room serviced by Rick. On the town, Hal finds out all about hard rockin'. They all finally come together with the big one …superstar Michael Christopher… and everyone just keeps on comin'! The fleet's in and there isn't a dry dock in town!
title: Shore Leave
